name: E x p e c t a t i o n s - 2 0 0 0
name_original: E x p e c t a t i o n s - 2 0 0 0
description:
E x p e c t a t i o n s - 2 0 0 0 is an adventure game developed by poliseche. It was originally released in 2022.
E x p e c t a t i o n s - 2 0 0 0 is available on Linux and PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
